person.persName: Anonymous praetorian prefect of the East

msIdentifier.repository: in the garden of a house near the Tycheion of Al-Sanamein

summary.term: Honorary inscription for an anonymous praetorian prefect

layout.p: One inscribed field (frons); the back and left faces bear a different inscription (IGLS 14, 0556a).
layout.rs: The first line of the inscription is ruined.
layout.p: Two other faces of the base bear a previous inscription, the dedication IGLS XIV, 556a.

history.provenance: found in 1997 in the road to the West of the Tycheion of Al-Sanamein

div.ab:
Τὸν λαμπρότατον
τὸν τοῦ ἱεροῦ πρετωρίου ἔπαρχον τοῦ δεσποτοῦ ἡμῶν
Κωνσταντίου τοῦ Αὐγούστου καὶ Νικήτου καὶ τοῦ ἐπι
φανεστάτου Καίσαρος Ἰουλιανοῦ διʹ οὗ ἰρήνη καὶ ἀμεριμνία
ὕπηρξεν ἡ Βατανέα τὸν εὐεργετὴν καὶ σωτήρα ἀνέστησεν,
ἐπὶ Φλαουίου Μαξίμου τοῦ διασημοτάτου δουκηναρίου τοῦ σάλτου.

div.p: Edition based on IGLS 14/2; AE 1999; SEG 49.

app.note: ὕπηρξεν IGLS 14/2; εὐεργετὴν IGLS 14/2; σωτήρα IGLS 14/2

div.p: “Of clarissimus rank, ..., the prefect of the sacred praetorium of our master Constantius Augustus and Victorious and of the most noble Caesar Julian, thanks to whom there is peace and security, the Batanaea has erected (the statue of his) benefactor and saviour, under Flavius Maximus, the most perfect ducenarius of the saltus.”

“LLe clarissime ... préfet du prétoire de notre maître Constance Auguste et vainqueur et du très illustre César Julien, par lequel paix et sérénité existent, la Batanée a dressé (la statue de son) bienfaiteur et sauveur, sous Flavius Maximus, l’éminent ducénaire du saltus.”

“Il chiarissimo ..., prefetto del sacro pretorio del nostro signore Constantius Augusto e Vincitore e del nobilissimo Cesare Iulianus, grazie al quale c’è la pace e la sicurezza, la Batanea ha eretto (la statua del suo) benefattore e salvatore, sotto Flavius Maximus, il perfettissimo ducenario del saltus.”
